Name: The Blood Pact that Corrupts to the Core
AttributesDescription:
Increases the Resonance Liberation DMG dealt by the active Resonator by 120% for 20s after every 10 instances of damage dealt by Resonators in the team.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: "His body grew heavier, the darkness wrapped around him, dragging him steadily toward the abyss. In the silence, only the whisper of the ring echoed, 'You cannot escape; no one can...'"
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases the Resonance Liberation DMG dealt by the active Resonator by 120% for 20s after every 10 instances of damage dealt by Resonators in the team.
